title: About
text1: Listing a carbon sequestration project with a major registry is cost-feasible only for large-scale projects. Smaller players are deprived of the economic benefits of participating in voluntary carbon markets.
text2: Lynx utilizes satellite remote-sensing and blockchain technologies to digitize the supply-side of carbon credits, providing traceability for each tonne of CO2e back to the source, and reducing or eliminating the need for costly manual monitoring and verification.
